name: simple-dom-helper
description: Offers simple helper functions to interact with DOM elements. Basically a really lightweight version of jQuery. The whole thing is a commonJS module.

scripts.getbuildsize: mkdir build-test && browserify simple-dom-helper.js -o build-test/simple-dom-helper.js && uglifyjs build-test/simple-dom-helper.js --mangle -o build-test/simple-dom-helper.min.js && gzip -k build-test/simple-dom-helper.min.js && du -sh build-test/* && rm -rf build-test
scripts.get-dist: browserify sdh-dist.js -o dist/sdh.js && uglifyjs dist/sdh.js --mangle -o dist/sdh.min.js
